title: Event Bus Bridge Architecture Fix
details:
## Bug #5 Fix: Internal/External Event Bus Bridge (v1.6.3.3)

### Root Cause
`VisibilityHandler` emits events on `internalEventBus`, but `PanelContentManager` listens on the external `eventBus` (from content.js). These are DIFFERENT instances, so events never reached the panel.

### Solution
Added `_setupEventBridge()` in QuickTabsManager (index.js) that forwards events:
- state:updated, state:deleted, state:created, state:added

### Event Flow
1. VisibilityHandler.handleMinimize() → internalEventBus.emit('state:updated')
2. _setupEventBridge() catches it → eventBus.emit('state:updated')
3. PanelContentManager.setupStateListeners() receives it → updateContent()

### Key Files
- src/features/quick-tabs/index.js - _setupEventBridge() method
- src/features/quick-tabs/handlers/VisibilityHandler.js - emits on internalEventBus
- src/features/quick-tabs/panel/PanelContentManager.js - listens on eventBus
